title: Is spiritual healing real?
description: Answer (1 of 42): Yes spiritual healing is real. I am a live example of this healing. At age 28 i suddenly had an attack of kidney disease which was autoimmune which is when your body starts to react to the negativity in your body. I went into a depression for a year then my husband told me that ...
